[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢---------------------------------------------------------------ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢

[i][b]Bad things happen for a reason.

5 seemingly ordinary people become trapped in a skyscraper elevator. Each has a dirty secret, a tainted past.

All seems well until the lights go out ... and the screaming begins.

With no way to escape, the horrific truth dawns that one of them is the Devil ... and only then do they realise that very bad things happen for very good reasons. 

From the mind of M Night Shyamalan (Sixth Sense, Signs), the director of Quarantine and the writer of 30 Days of Night, Devil is an unforgettably scary movie that will leave you breathless.
[/b][/i]
